summary:
Z-Library is an online library that shares academic articles, textbooks, and books. It started as a copy of another website, Library Genesis, but has grown a lot. By 2023, it had millions of books and articles. Many people in developing countries and academics use it.

The website claims to be the world's largest digital library for books and scientific articles. It's a non-profit, asking for donations to keep running. They want to lend physical books too. However, Z-Library is illegal in some places due to copyright issues, and it's available on the dark web. People are still debating its impact on publishers and authors.
title: Z-Library
